questions.question: This puzzle is ___ than that one.
questions.explanation: 比較級は easy → easier です。

questions.question: Today is ___ than yesterday.
questions.explanation: hot の比較級は hotter です。

questions.question: My bag is ___ than yours.
questions.explanation: heavy の比較級は heavier です。

questions.question: The river is ___ than the lake.
questions.explanation: long の比較級は longer です。

questions.question: This math problem is ___ than the last one.
questions.explanation: hard の比較級は harder です。

questions.question: The blue sofa is ___ than the green one.
questions.explanation: 長い形容詞は more + 形容詞 です。

questions.question: Spring is ___ than winter here.
questions.explanation: warm の比較級は warmer です。

questions.question: She is ___ than her brother.
questions.explanation: tall の比較級は taller です。

questions.question: This road is ___ than the other one.
questions.explanation: wide の比較級は wider です。

questions.question: My new shoes are ___ than the old ones.
questions.explanation: expensive は more を使います。

questions.question: The second quiz was ___ than the first.
questions.explanation: short の比較級は shorter です。

questions.question: This street is ___ than that one.
questions.explanation: clean の比較級は cleaner です。

questions.question: My explanation is ___ than his.
questions.explanation: clear の比較級は clearer です。

questions.question: Summer vacation is ___ than spring break.
questions.explanation: long の比較級は longer です。

questions.question: She is ___ than her classmates.
questions.explanation: diligent は more を使います。

questions.question: This park is ___ than the one near my house.
questions.explanation: big の比較級は bigger です。

questions.question: This movie is ___ than the book.
questions.explanation: interesting は more を使います。

questions.question: The new tablet is ___ than the old model.
questions.explanation: light の比較級は lighter です。

questions.question: This song is ___ than that one.
questions.explanation: popular は more を使います。

questions.question: Our classroom is ___ than theirs.
questions.explanation: bright の比較級は brighter です。

questions.question: My English is ___ than before.
questions.explanation: good の比較級は better です。

questions.question: This task is ___ than I expected.
questions.explanation: bad の比較級は worse です。

questions.question: He can run ___ than his brother.
questions.explanation: fast の比較級は faster です。

questions.question: This road is ___ than that one.
questions.explanation: far の比較級の一つは farther です。

questions.question: Her ideas are ___ than mine.
questions.explanation: good の比較級は better です。

questions.question: The blue sweater looks ___ on you than the red one.
questions.explanation: good の比較級は better です。

questions.question: This year we have ___ homework than last year.
questions.explanation: 不可算名詞には less を使います。

questions.question: He drove ___ than usual to catch the train.
questions.explanation: fast の比較級は faster です。

questions.question: The new textbook is ___ to understand than the old one.
questions.explanation: easy の比較級は easier です。

questions.question: This path is ___ than the main road.
questions.explanation: narrow の比較級は narrower です。

questions.question: Mount Fuji is the ___ mountain in Japan.
questions.explanation: 最上級は high → highest です。

questions.question: This is the ___ story I have ever heard.
questions.explanation: funny の最上級は funniest です。

questions.question: He is the ___ student in our class.
questions.explanation: tall の最上級は tallest です。

questions.question: This is the ___ question on the test.
questions.explanation: hard の最上級は hardest です。

questions.question: She is the ___ dancer in the group.
questions.explanation: good の最上級は best です。

questions.question: August is the ___ month of the year here.
questions.explanation: hot の最上級は hottest です。

questions.question: This is the ___ way to get there.
questions.explanation: easy の最上級は easiest です。

questions.question: That was the ___ movie I've seen this year.
questions.explanation: 長い形容詞の最上級は most + 形容詞 です。

questions.question: She is the ___ singer in the choir.
questions.explanation: popular の最上級は most popular です。

questions.question: This is the ___ restaurant in town.
questions.explanation: famous の最上級は most famous です。

questions.question: He is the ___ player on the team.
questions.explanation: strong の最上級は strongest です。

questions.question: This is the ___ answer of all.
questions.explanation: short の最上級は shortest です。

questions.question: She lives in the ___ house in the village.
questions.explanation: large の最上級は largest です。

questions.question: It was the ___ day of the year.
questions.explanation: cold の最上級は coldest です。

questions.question: This lake is the ___ in the region.
questions.explanation: deep の最上級は deepest です。

questions.question: She solved the problem the ___.
questions.explanation: fast の最上級は fastest です。

questions.question: He gave the ___ presentation today.
questions.explanation: good の最上級は best です。

questions.question: This is the ___ bridge in the city.
questions.explanation: long の最上級は longest です。

questions.question: This is the ___ book I have.
questions.explanation: thick の最上級は thickest です。

questions.question: He is the ___ member of the club.
questions.explanation: young の最上級は youngest です。

questions.question: She is the ___ runner on the team.
questions.explanation: fast の最上級は fastest です。

questions.question: He got the ___ score in the class.
questions.explanation: high の最上級は highest です。

questions.question: This is the ___ museum I've ever visited.
questions.explanation: most + 形容詞 です。

questions.question: She sings the ___ in the choir.
questions.explanation: good の最上級は best です。

questions.question: It was the ___ day in memory.
questions.explanation: bad の最上級は worst です。

questions.question: He came up with the ___ solution.
questions.explanation: good の最上級は best です。

questions.question: This was the ___ of his worries.
questions.explanation: little の最上級は least です。

questions.question: She traveled the ___ distance among us.
questions.explanation: far の最上級は farthest/furthest です。

questions.question: It is the ___ known fact about the island.
questions.explanation: best を使います。

questions.question: He is the ___ of the three brothers.
questions.explanation: 家族関係では eldest を使えます。

questions.question: This blue bag is as ___ as the red one.
questions.explanation: as...as の中は原級を使います。

questions.question: He is as ___ as his father.
questions.explanation: as...as で原級を使います。

questions.question: My bike is as ___ as yours.
questions.explanation: 原級 new を使います。

questions.question: She sings as ___ as a professional singer.
questions.explanation: as...as の中は well です。

questions.question: This road is as ___ as that one.
questions.explanation: 原級 wide を使います。

questions.question: The movie was as ___ as the book.
questions.explanation: 原級 interesting を使います。

questions.question: He runs as ___ as his brother.
questions.explanation: 原級 fast を使います。

questions.question: Our school festival was as ___ as last year's.
questions.explanation: 原級 exciting を使います。

questions.question: She is as ___ as a college student.
questions.explanation: 原級 busy を使います。

questions.question: This cake tastes as ___ as the one my mom makes.
questions.explanation: taste の原級 good を使います。

questions.question: The classroom is as ___ as the library.
questions.explanation: 原級 quiet を使います。

questions.question: He can speak English as ___ as his sister.
questions.explanation: 副詞の原級 fluently を使います。

questions.question: This test is as ___ as the practice test.
questions.explanation: 原級 difficult を使います。

questions.question: Our town is as ___ as the neighboring town.
questions.explanation: 原級 safe を使います。

questions.question: The robot cleans the room as ___ as we do.
questions.explanation: 副詞の原級 carefully を使います。

questions.question: This book is not as ___ as that one.
questions.explanation: not as...as の中は原級です。

questions.question: The train today is not as ___ as yesterday.
questions.explanation: 原級 crowded を使います。

questions.question: My bag is not as ___ as yours.
questions.explanation: 原級 heavy を使います。

questions.question: This river is not as ___ as the Nile.
questions.explanation: 原級 long を使います。

questions.question: His answer was not as ___ as hers.
questions.explanation: 原級 clear を使います。

questions.question: This room is not as ___ as the living room.
questions.explanation: 原級 bright を使います。

questions.question: My test score is not as ___ as my friend's.
questions.explanation: 原級 high を使います。

questions.question: The movie wasn't as ___ as I expected.
questions.explanation: 原級 funny を使います。

questions.question: This soup isn't as ___ as last time.
questions.explanation: 原級 salty を使います。

questions.question: The hike wasn't as ___ as we thought.
questions.explanation: 原級 hard を使います。

questions.question: He ran ___ than his teammates.
questions.explanation: 副詞 fast の比較級は faster です。

questions.question: She sings ___ than anyone else in the class.
questions.explanation: beautifully の比較級は more beautifully です。

questions.question: Tom solved the puzzle ___ than Ken.
questions.explanation: quickly の比較級は more quickly です。

questions.question: This computer works ___ than that old one.
questions.explanation: smoothly の比較級は more smoothly です。

questions.question: She answered the questions ___ than I did.
questions.explanation: accurately の比較級は more accurately です。

questions.question: He speaks English ___ than before.
questions.explanation: fluently の比較級は more fluently です。

questions.question: They worked ___ than we expected.
questions.explanation: hard の比較級は harder です。

questions.question: She drives ___ than her sister.
questions.explanation: carefully の比較級は more carefully です。

questions.question: The river flows ___ in spring than in summer.
questions.explanation: fast の比較級は faster です。

questions.question: We arrived ___ than the others.
questions.explanation: early の比較級は earlier です。

questions.question: We need ___ chairs than last time.
questions.explanation: 多いの比較級は more です。

questions.question: She has ___ books than I do.
questions.explanation: 可算名詞には fewer を使います。

questions.question: There is ___ water in this bottle than in that one.
questions.explanation: 不可算名詞には less を使います。

questions.question: He made ___ mistakes this time.
questions.explanation: 可算名詞 mistake には fewer。

questions.question: We spent ___ money on the trip than we planned.
questions.explanation: more を使います。
